scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-toolkit && npm run install-dynamic
scripts.link-all: npm run link-toolkit && npm run link-dynamic
scripts.unlink-all: npm run unlink-toolkit && npm run unlink-dynamic
scripts.publish-all: npm run publish-toolkit && npm run publish-dynamic
scripts.link-toolkit: cd packages/dev-toolkit && npm link dev-toolkit && cd ../../
scripts.unlink-toolkit: cd packages/dev-toolkit && npm unlink dev-toolkit && cd ../../
scripts.link-dynamic: cd packages/dynamic-pages && npm link dynamic-pages && cd ../../
scripts.unlink-dynamic: cd packages/dynamic-pages && npm unlink dynamic-pages && cd ../../
